title: DJ Clay - The Mixxtape Volume 2(2008)
description:
With Let \&#039;Em Bleed Volume 2, DJ Clay proves that the blood is still flowing! With the first volume, his turntable was just heating up. With Volume 2, he\&#039;s meeting the Juggalo demand with more heat, more homies, and more hard-hitting beats. The Let \&#039;Em Bleed series is a win-win combination! It\&#039;s the dopest Psychopathic tracks mixed in with the freshest guests, over the baddest beats, tricked out by DJ Clay!
